de.piratenpartei.id.vote

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.piratenpartei.id.vote.Config

  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Config stores all those configuration parameters that are somehow chosen arbitrarily. Currently, this file is a mess, since it also contains information that should be configurable, like the URLs of resource files.
    Author:
    arne
